message: Hello Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your needs. Considering its value and quality, I propose a price of $9500 for this exceptional item. I look forward to your response.

Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of your product, but I'm looking to keep my expenses within a certain budget. I'm willing to pay up to $8000 for the product. Please let me know if this is possible.
